Sean Tobin will compete in the 3,000m final at the European Athletics Indoor Championships in Torun, Poland after running a personal best time in today's heats.

articles.description: Sean Tobin will compete in the 3,000m final at the European Athletics Indoor Championships after running a personal best in today's heats while Sarah Lavin will take part in the 60m hurdles semi-finals thanks to a PB in her heat.
articles.title: Euro Indoors: Tobin into 3,000m final, Reid out of 60m - RTE.ie
